translation.en: I'm not the reason you're standing in a line you shouldn't be.

translation.en: We could use her to persuade Christine to come out of the bank.

translation.en: Why don't you give them what they want? Let sanity prevail!

translation.en: He got killed because he was Black. We get killed because we are Black.
translation.vi: He got killed because he was Black. We get killed because we are Black.
